bulk-upload-uan.maxFileSize: The selected file must be smaller than 25MB
bulk-upload-uan.fileType: The selected file must be a CSV.
bulk-upload-uan.processFormatError: The file is not formatted correctly – reformat the data and try again
bulk-upload-uan.uploadError: The selected file could not be uploaded – try again
bulk-upload-uan.noColumnHeadings: The file does not have column headings. Include headings for every column
bulk-upload-uan.invalidColumns: Please ensure you have at least the following columns in your CSV file: UAN which has BAN alerts under IMA 2023, Date of birth, Duty to remove Alert
bulk-upload-uan.missingUanColumn: The file is missing a UAN which has BAN alerts under IMA 2023 column. Include a UAN which has BAN alerts under IMA 2023 column with data and a heading
bulk-upload-uan.missingDobColumn: The file is missing a Date of birth column. Include a Date of birth column with data and a heading
bulk-upload-uan.missingDtrColumn: The file is missing a Duty to remove Alert column. Include a Duty to remove Alert column with data and a heading

confirm-data-checked.required: Confirm that this file contains complete and correct records.
